img_text: 7:20 Katie ott @Kotterr97 2 and a half months not in 7:15 PM You accepted the request thanks for correcting my tweet when you don't even follow me or have talked to me in how many years? 7:17 PM Just makes me cringe when people don't use correct grammar 7:18 PM and it makes me cringe when people are rude. 7:18 PM Same! 7:19 PM Start a message 仓
